name: Aura
additional_info: Super pas. Kao nov. Uvijek uz vlasnika u setnji. Socijalizovana, nije agresivna na ljude. Prvi vlasik. Veliki servis, kvacilo, diskovi i pakne zamijenjene. Zna otvarati Å¡teku na vratima pa se cuvajte toga. Ne cuje se ziva osim kad cuva teritoriju. Ne ganja kokose, ali zna nekada mace zaganjati.

name: Mrvica
additional_info: Mrvica is a gentle and cuddly hamster. She enjoys running on her wheel and snacking on sunflower seeds. She's easy to handle and loves to explore her cage.

name: Kala
additional_info: Kala is a loyal and obedient Labrador Retriever. She enjoys swimming in the lake and playing fetch with her favorite tennis ball. She's great with kids and loves to cuddle.

name: Macici
additional_info: Macici are adorable and playful kittens. They love chasing after toys and exploring their surroundings. They're litter-trained and enjoy cuddling together in a cozy bed.

name: Tom
additional_info: Tom is a handsome and affectionate American Shorthair cat. He enjoys lounging in sunny spots and chasing after feather toys. He's litter-trained and loves to be brushed.

name: Pepe
additional_info: Pepe is a colorful and talkative Amazon parrot. He enjoys mimicking sounds and learning new words. He's sociable and loves to interact with his human companions.

name: Edgar
additional_info: Edgar is a charming and playful Pug. He enjoys snuggling on the couch and playing with squeaky toys. He's great with kids and loves to be the center of attention.
